Posts.EditableText:
Hello,

I'm a french user of Quest 5.8. My intend was to use Quest for commercial use, and convert my game in android app. I was really excited by this functionality, and I found the method consisting in using quest.js and phonegap. 
However, apparently quest.js is no longer maintained, and I can't find any "exe" to use. So, I don't understand how to use all this files for the conversion. Is it still possible to convert my quest game into html ?

Thank you
Posts.HTML:
Hello,

I'm a french user of Quest 5.8. My intend was to use Quest for commercial use, and convert my game in android app. I was really excited by this functionality, and I found the method consisting in using quest.js and phonegap.
However, apparently quest.js is no longer maintained, and I can't find any "exe" to use. So, I don't understand how to use all this files for the conversion. Is it still possible to convert my quest game into html ?

Thank you
